name: Dark Default Journal Skin for DeviantArt & sta.sh
description: Alters the default "Green Journal" journal skin by inverting its colors, making it dark with light text. Affects journals, literature, and literature thumbnails on deviantart.com and sta.sh.
additional_info:
<u>1.1:</u> minor fix concerning the background color not changing properly on some default-skin journals.
<u>1.0:</u> initial release. Supports journals and literature thumbnails on both deviantart.com and sta.sh.
